version_description:
• The program guide (EPG) is now available free to all (for now only available in Spain and UK, soon more).
• Support for new video servers.
• Minor bug fixes.
• Small design changes.

We have moved to a new servers fasters and bigger space to offer free programming guide (EPG) for everyone !!
With this change we can also offer EPG in new countries very soon.

If you are currently using the program guide, please update to this version to continue enjoying it.

• The program guide (EPG) is now available free to all (for now only available in Spain and UK, soon more).
• Support for new video servers.
• Minor bug fixes.
• Small design changes.

We have moved to a new servers fasters and bigger space to offer free programming guide (EPG) for everyone !!
With this change we can also offer EPG in new countries very soon.

If you are currently using the program guide, please update to this version to continue enjoying it.

• Fixed a problem using the 'Update' option when the playlist has the EPG configured.
• Improvements in the EPG when is consulted from a different time zone.
• Fixes in the EPG that sometimes did not display the right hour on the programs.
• Minor bug fixes.
• Small design changes.

We have received many questions regarding the use of AirPlay in the application so we have added in the 'FAQ / CONTACT US' section a little help to use it.

Remember if you have any problems with the application please contact us from the section 'FAQ / CONTACT US' before making a negative review, we will contact you as soon as possible.

• Fixed a problem using the 'Update' option when the playlist has the EPG configured.
• Improvements in the EPG when is consulted from a different time zone.
• Fixes in the EPG that sometimes did not display the right hour on the programs.
• Minor bug fixes.
• Small design changes.

We have received many questions regarding the use of AirPlay in the application so we have added in the 'FAQ / CONTACT US' section a little help to use it.

Remember if you have any problems with the application please contact us from the section 'FAQ / CONTACT US' before making a negative review, we will contact you as soon as possible.

This new version is loaded with new features.

We have introduced the PRO version with the following features:
• Support Chromecast (ONLY VALID FOR COMPATIBLE TYPES OF VIDEO/AUDIO on the "FAQ / Contact us" section find more information)
• Background playback
• Parental control
• External Player.
• Soon more ...

If you want to know more about the PRO version, on the application settings tap on the information icon ( i ).

Additional general improvements have been made to the application:
• You can rearrange playlists with just a long tap on the list you want to change your order.
• Redesigned the section for add new lists.
• Added EPG to Italy (for now in BETA, so some images may not appear)
• Now you can share the link from the playlist if it was added using a link.
• "What's New!!" to highlight the most interesting changes of each new release after updating.
• Improved 3D Touch shortcuts of home screen.
• And as always stability improvements.

If you have any questions about the application please contact us, and remember if you like the app we ask you to take a few minutes to leave us your 5 star review on the AppStore.

• New Apple TV 4th generation application!! Go to your Apple tv and install it.
• You can send your playlists to your Apple TV

• Minor bug fixes.

• Fix for app crash on launch screen for some users.
• Improvements for share playlist from iOS to Apple TV (You must to update Apple TV application too)
• Minor bug fixes
• Mexico EPG added
• Solve issue for some videos with no audio

• Fix for app crash on launch screen for some users.
• Improvements for share playlist from iOS to Apple TV (You must to update Apple TV application too)
• Minor bug fixes
• Mexico EPG added
• Solve issue for some videos with no audio

• Fixes playback for some freeze channels.
• Improvements for share playlist from iOS to Apple TV (You must to update Apple TV application too)

***This version doesn't support audio AC3***

• Fixes playback for some freeze channels.
• Improvements for share playlist from iOS to Apple TV (You must to update Apple TV application too)
• Minor bug fixes

***This version doesn't support audio AC3***

• Minor fixes
• Now you can send favorites playlist to Apple TV
• Fixed issue that prevented loading some M3U playlists

Apple TV 4th application updates (Please update on the tvOS App Store):

• New cool design for the M3U playlists. Please enjoy it!!
• Now you can rearrange your playlists with the new option 'Move', you can find it in the actions menu holding the select button on your Siri remote
• M3U groups finally here, now if your playlist has groups (group-title='****'), select the arrow to the left of the playlist name to filter the channels. (Please manually update your playlists for update the groups, only first time)
• Revamped player interface with time line, actual time, time remain, logo and EPG (If playlist has a country configured)
• Swipe down for more playback options such audio and subtitles tracks, aspect or deinterlace. (Only If the video allows it)
• On the player tap and hold select button on your Siri Remote to open the complete EPG list for the actual channel (Only available if playlist has a country configured)
• If the video allows, you can now rewind or fast forward by swipe left or right on your Siri Remote
• Dark mode available if you use the Dark mode setting on your Apple TV
• New settings page for increase the time buffer on playback.

• Minor fixes
• Now you can send favorites playlist to Apple TV
• Fixed issue that prevented loading some M3U playlists

Apple TV 4th application updates (Please update on the tvOS App Store):

• New cool design for the M3U playlists. Please enjoy it!!
• Now you can rearrange your playlists with the new option 'Move', you can find it in the actions menu holding the select button on your Siri remote
• M3U groups finally here, now if your playlist has groups (group-title='****'), select the arrow to the left of the playlist name to filter the channels. (Please manually update your playlists for update the groups, only first time)
• Revamped player interface with time line, actual time, time remain, logo and EPG (If playlist has a country configured)
• Swipe down for more playback options such audio and subtitles tracks, aspect or deinterlace. (Only If the video allows it)
• On the player tap and hold select button on your Siri Remote to open the complete EPG list for the actual channel (Only available if playlist has a country configured)
• If the video allows, you can now rewind or fast forward by swipe left or right on your Siri Remote
• Dark mode available if you use the Dark mode setting on your Apple TV
• New settings page for increase the time buffer on playback.

- Added support for more video and audio formats for the M3U playlists
- For remote M3U playlists you can now edit the URL, swipe right over the playlist name and tap the green icon (edit)
- A few visual changes
- Fixed that the Favorites were deleted when update a remote playlist
- Fix for some m3u links that not loaded properly
- Minor bug fixes
- We update the application to Swift 3


• Apple TV 4th application updates (Please update on the tvOS App Store):

- New setting to change font size on EPG and playlists, you can now choose small, normal, large and x-large
- New setting for load automatically a playlist when the application open
- Added the channel list to the right of the screen, so you can now make zapping in full screen. To use it, just press and hold the Select button on your siri remote on the full screen mode
- Fixed that the Favorites were deleted when update a remote playlist
- Fix for some m3u links that not loaded properly
- Minor bug fixes
- We update the application to Swift 3

+ Performance improvements and bug fixes
+ Performance improvements and bug fixes

What's new:
• You can now delete channels individually from your M3U playlists, just swipe left on the channel you want to delete.
• You can play individual links without the need to create a playlist. Just look for the "Play" icon in the main menu.

Additionally, in this update we have corrected many annoying bugs, we continue to make the application more stable, so we hope you continue enjoying Cloud Stream. If so, we would love if you write us a review in the App Store.

What's new:
• You can now delete channels individually from your M3U playlists, just swipe left on the channel you want to delete.
• You can play individual links without the need to create a playlist. Just look for the "Play" icon in the main menu.

Additionally, in this update we have corrected many annoying bugs, we continue to make the application more stable, so we hope you continue enjoying Cloud Stream. If so, we would love if you write us a review in the App Store.

- Support to iOS 11
- Reduced size of application
- Fix for some streams
- Minor bug fixes

- Support to iOS 11
- Reduced size of application
- Fix for some streams
- Minor bug fixes

• iOS 11 design improvements
• New design and animations
• Added "Hardware Decoding" option in the player settings. By default the settings is On.
• Added gesture "Swipe left" in the player, to see the channel list
• Added new external player: nPlayer
• Editing favorites, you can now reorder and delete channels from your favorites, just use the "Pencil" icon
• Fixed some annoying bugs

• iOS 11 design improvements
• New design and animations
• Added "Hardware Decoding" option in the player settings. By default the settings is On.
• Added gesture "Swipe left" in the player, to see the channel list
• Added new external player: nPlayer
• Editing favorites, you can now reorder and delete channels from your favorites, just use the "Pencil" icon
• Fixed some annoying bugs

- iPhone X support
- Now you can pin playlist (right menu) on the player. Just on/off the switch at the top right of the screen.

As usual bug fixes and improvements under the hood for make Cloud Stream better. If you like the application please give us a review.

- iPhone X support
- Now you can pin playlist (right menu) on the player. Just on/off the switch at the top right of the screen.

As usual bug fixes and improvements under the hood for make Cloud Stream better. If you like the application please give us a review.

• Fix "Fill" option on the full screen player for the iPhone X, now you can enjoy the full screen mode for the iPhone X
• Fixed transparency in "Dark mode" for some earlier models
• Now the "Fill" option on the player remembers the last used setting
• Adjustments to layout and keyboard for devices with small screen
• Adjustments to layout for landscape mode

• Now the dark mode is present all over application

• Face ID support for parental control (only PRO version)

It has been a while since our last update, but we wanted to make sure that everything worked as it should, to make Cloud Stream better and better!

- These are the new features in this version:
● Added support for iOS 12
● Support for the new Xs, Xs Max and Xr iPhones
● Several minor bugs corrected

- News PRO version:
● Design-level changes when using Chromecast
● Improvements in sending to Chromecast, we have solved some problems related to some streams that did not play correctly

To unleash the full power of iOS 12 within Cloud Stream and provide you with the best experience, we need to drop support for iOS 9.
Please update your devices to the latest iOS version if you want to receive further updates.
This will be the latest version that will support iOS 9.

We keep improving and reading all your comments, we have prepared new features that will be published little by little.

Welcome to the all-new Cloud Stream!
It took several months of tremendous effort to redesign Cloud Stream from scratch and bring the best playback experience for everyone, but finally is here!!

This is the biggest update since Cloud Stream first release, and this are some of the new big changes:

• New Design
New impressively simpler, effortless and modern design.

• Enjoy Dark Mode
A native dark mode experience, switch modes or use it automatically on iOS 13.

• Playlist with icons or avatars
Personalize your playlists and streams with hundreds of preset icons or even you can use your own images.

• Customize appearance
Choose your own style customizing the interface colors according to your mood.

• Sync of playlists on all your iOS devices
Keep up to date all your playlists on all your devices through iCloud synchronization

• Groups management
Create, edit, delete and manage all your streams inside practical groups

• Widget
New widget for access to your favorite playlists or streams directly from your home screen.

• Drag and drop
From your iPad import easily your playlists, simply drag and drop a file or URL directly to the app.

Beyond these major new features and thanks to your reviews and comments Cloud stream also include a handful of important bug fixes and enhancements:

- Drop support to iOS 10
- Increase application performance
- Drop support to W3U playlists (Wiseplay)
- Some of new features require iOS 13, please update your devices to the latest iOS version if you want to receive further updates and enhancements.

I hope you love this update as much as I’ve loved making it.
If you need help you can find support at @cloudstreamplay on twitter.

Thanks for supporting an indie developer #StayAtHome

We hear your feedback and reviews, and that is why we have made slight changes on player.

• Player is now always full screen
• Now you can open your stream list directly from full screen by tapping on the list button or by swiping left
• You can filter by favorites also on the full-screen list
• For comfort now you can close player by swiping down with your finger
• Added a loading buffer indicator when streams are loading

Beyond these major new features and thanks to your reviews and comments Cloud stream also include a handful of important bug fixes and enhancements.

I hope you love this update as much as I’ve loved making it.
If you need help you can find support at @cloudstreamplay on twitter.

• For comfort now you can close player by swiping down with your finger
• Added a loading buffer indicator when streams are loading

Beyond these major new features and thanks to your reviews and comments Cloud stream also include a handful of important bug fixes and enhancements.

I hope you love this update as much as I’ve loved making it.
If you need help you can find support at @cloudstreamplay on twitter.

We hear your feedback and reviews, and that is why we have made slight changes on player.

• Player is now always full screen
• Now you can open your stream list directly from full screen by tapping on the list button or by swiping left
• You can filter by favorites also on the full-screen list
• For comfort now you can close player by swiping down with your finger
• Added a loading buffer indicator when streams are loading

Beyond these major new features and thanks to your reviews and comments Cloud stream also include a handful of important bug fixes and enhancements.

I hope you love this update as much as I’ve loved making it.
If you need help you can find support at @cloudstreamplay on twitter.

Are you taking advantage of the groups ? Well here are some new features related:

• You can now besides default list on startup, pick a group or simply open your selected playlist on the selection group view. Just go to app settings and tap Default playlist option.
• Sort groups at your convenience, this order will be reflected all over the app. Just hit Edit button on Groups list and arrange them using the indicator at the right.

Also a few improvements on the player:

• Seek bar for those streams that allows it.
• New setting on Player options, rewind and fast forward seconds let you to jump back or forward on the full screen player if stream allows it.
• Improvements for accessibility VoiceOver on full screen player.

For iOS 13 users we added a couple of quick actions to open groups or favorites, simply use 3D Touch (if available) or long press over playlist name to open it.

As usual beyond these major new features and thanks to your reviews and comments Cloud Stream also include a handful of important bug fixes and enhancements.

If you need help you can find support at @cloudstreamplay on twitter.

New on this version:

• Now you can know the number of streams inside each group
• Added more options for aspect ratio like 16:9 or 4:3 just tap on the fill button on the player
• Bug fixes
• Optimizations and improvements

New on this version:

• Added new function to create a backup for all your playlists and save them or share them, just go to application settings to use it (Only available for PRO users)
• Increased timeout to 60 seconds when update a playlist
• Bug fixes, optimizations and improvements

If you need help you can find support at @cloudstreamplay on twitter.
